title: Confused About Investing? Start with These Two Things
subtitle: Mastering time horizon and asset allocation is essential for successful investment strategies.
content:
Confused About Investing? Start with These Two Things

If you’re confused about investing, start with these two things because nothing else matters if you don’t get them right.

1. Time Horizon

If you need the money in under five years, it does not belong in the stock market. That’s not investing; that’s roulette.

2. Asset Allocation

You don’t need the perfect mix, but you do need one you won’t bail on when the market drops 20%.

3. Everything Else

Sector picks, economic forecasts, or whatever the Fed is doing or not doing this week? That’s bonus content, not the main point.

Conclusion

If you can understand nothing else, focus on time and temperament. If any of this is helpful, sign up for my free newsletter by clicking the link in my bio.
